author: Jacob Gallant
title: Marc Gasol drains 3-pointers in practice
text:
Marc Gasol drains 3-pointers in practice - WMC Action News 5 - Memphis, Tennessee Member Center: Marc Gasol drains 3-pointers in practice Posted: (Source: Memphis Grizzlies Facebook) MEMPHIS, TN (WMC) - 
The regular season might not have started yet, but Marc Gasol already appears to be in mid-season form. 
Gasol was seen in practice draining 3-pointers from all around the arc. 
It was a rare showing from Big Spain, as the center is rarely behind the arc in games. He has hit just 10 of 63 3-pointers (15%) he has attempted in his career and has never sunk more than three in one season. 
In practice, Gasol drilled 19 of 25 (76%) 3-pointers from all around the key. ICYMI: Marc Gasol knocks down 19 three-pointers (76% from 3) at... 
If his practice was any indication of a new wrinkle in his game, the Grizzlies may be getting even more than they thought when Gasol signed a 5-year, $110 million deal in July . 
After hitting the threes, Gasol was greeted by a big roar of the crowd and was mobbed by his Grizzlies teammates, adding in a few bicep kisses for good measure.
